{"id":264896612,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 6 months","timestamp":1569637830,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/264896612/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"#include <unordered_map>\n#include <iostream>\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        unordered_map<char, int> umap;\n        \n        int m_len = 0;\n        int len = 0; \n        if (s.size() <= 1) {\n            return s.size();\n        }\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {\n            len++;\n            if (umap[s[i]] >= (i - len + 1)) {\n                \n                \n                len = i - umap[s[i]];\n            }\n            \n            if (len > m_len) {\n                    m_len = len;\n                    \n            }\n            // cout << s[i] << ' '<< umap[s[i]] << ' ' << len << endl;\n            umap[s[i]] = i;\n        }      \n        \n        if (len > m_len) {\n            m_len = len;\n        }\n        \n        return m_len;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
